metadata.Title: CVE-2023-49554 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Use After Free vulnerability in YASM 1.3.0.86.g9def allows a remoteattacker to cause a denial of service via the do_directive function in themodules/preprocs/nasm/nasm-pp.c component.

criterions.comment: yasm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
